channel.title: Project insanity keeping firecape upon death
channel.description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How can i make it so you dont lose firecape on death before you start to flame
iam not good with insanity just started it and need help.

[/quote]
Insanity is Delta.
It’s just packaged thoroughly, and uses slightly different methods.
[hr]
For the problem, you’re searching the wrong files.
public void keepItem( is in:
src.server.model.items.ItemAssistant.[/quote]

so what do i put there can you just put the code and where to put it?

and right under that add this

if (keep6570) { addItem(6570, 1); keep6570 = true;

that’ll do it

item.source: Project insanity keeping firecape upon death

item.title: Project insanity keeping firecape upon death
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

not exactly sure but in your public void death() or w.e. at the bottom put

if(hasItemID == FireCapeIdHere) {
addItem(FireCapeIdHere, 1);
}

and put it at the very button.
that way if their firecape gets dropped
they’ll get a new one in their inventory.
only problem is if they figure this out then they’ll go out with nothing but a firecape
and get killed and spawn free firecapes.
a way to fix this though would at the very top add

if(hasItemID == FireCapeIdHere) {
deleteItem(FireCapeIdHere, 1);
}

that way if they have one it will get delted
then theyll get a new one and they cant dupe firecapes

Read full topic
